resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107225</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107225</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205457</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Home, Sweet Home: headRush</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haupt-, Süsses Haus: headRush</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maison À la maison et Douce : headRush</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">HOME Home, Doce: headRush</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sede Domestica E Dolce: headRush</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Οικία", γλυκιά "Οικία": headRush</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hogar Casero, Dulce: headRush</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK explores the work of theatrical performance group headRush. This Educator Guide is about the exploration and history of experimental, political theater and performance art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN erforscht die Arbeit des theatrical 
Leistung Gruppe headRush. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über die
Erforschung und die Geschichte des experimentellen, politischen 
Theaters und der Leistung kunst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE explore le travail du headRush 
théâtral de classe d'utilisation des ressources. Ce guide 
d'éducateur est au sujet de l'exploration et de l'histoire du 
théâtre et de l'art expérimentaux et politiques d'exécution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA explora o trabalho do headRush 
theatrical do grupo de desempenho. Esta guia do educador é 
sobre a exploração e o history do teatro e da arte experimentais, 
políticos do desempenho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA esplora il lavoro del headRush 
teatrale del gruppo di prestazioni. Questa guida dell'educatore 
è circa l'esplorazione e la storia del teatro e dell'arte 
sperimentali e politici di prestazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ ερευνά την εργασία της θεατρικής ομάδας 
απόδοσης headRush. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι 
για την εξερεύνηση και την ιστορία του πειραματικού, πολιτικού 
θεάτρου και της τέχνης απόδοσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA explora el trabajo del headRush de 
teatro del grupo de funcionamiento. Esta guía del educador 
está sobre la exploración y la historia del teatro y del arte 
experimentales, políticos del funcionamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205457</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107225</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/home-sweet-home-headrush</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
